New Records: Mohammad Rizwan scored 57 runs for Pakistan on 43 balls, finishing not out.
Shaheen Shah Afridi was the highest impact player with 65.84 points.
Key Match Events: Pakistan won the match by 7 wickets with 5 balls remaining.
New Zealand were all out for 152/4 in 20 overs.
Pakistan's chase was comfortable with 153/3 in 19.1 overs.
Pre-Game Insights: New Zealand elected to bat first after winning the toss.
Pakistan's batting order included Mohammad Rizwan and Babar Azam.
Post-Match Reflections: Mohammad Rizwan was named Player of the Match.
Pakistan advanced in the ICC Men's T20 World Cup.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at the Sydney Cricket Ground with 33,443 attendees.
Others: The match was part of the 2022-23 ICC Men's T20 World Cup.
